name: Daikon - Ludum Dare 52
description:
Fill up your basket with delicious daikon! Click on the base of a plant to start pulling. Move the mouse left and right to loosen it, then move up to pull it out. Press 'o' for mouse options. Enable mouse lock if you have trouble pulling.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 52, by Hardy Whitney and Angelina Lu

Some sound effects from TerraZoo by Sound of Essen at soundofessen.com

Music from opengameart.org

RPG Market Theme - by João Vitor Lisboa

Fast fight / battle music - by Ville Nousiainen, looped version by xcvg at xcvgsystems.com
